sqlMap.sql: SELECT buyer_id,buyer_name,buyer_lgu, buyer_bank,buyer_bankno,buyer_bankname, buyer_zip,buyer_add1,buyer_add2, buyer_comtel,buyer_fax,buyer_mail, buyer_charger FROM buyer
sqlMap.select: SELECT buyer_id,buyer_name,buyer_lgu, buyer_bank,buyer_bankno,buyer_bankname, buyer_zip,buyer_add1,buyer_add2, buyer_comtel,buyer_fax,buyer_mail, buyer_charger, lprod_id, lprod_gu, lprod_nm FROM buyer inner join lprod on(buyer_lgu = lprod_gu) where buyer_id = #buyer_id#

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(
ORDER BY ROWID DESC ) A ) B
WHERE RNUM >= #startRow# AND RNUM <= #endRow#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO Buyer ( buyer_id,buyer_name,buyer_lgu, buyer_bank,buyer_bankno,buyer_bankname, buyer_zip,buyer_add1,buyer_add2, buyer_comtel,buyer_fax,buyer_mail,buyer_charger ) VALUES ( #buyer_id#,#buyer_name#,#buyer_lgu#, #buyer_bank#,#buyer_bankno#,#buyer_bankname#, #buyer_zip#,#buyer_add1#,#buyer_add2#, #buyer_comtel#,#buyer_fax#,#buyer_mail#, #buyer_charger# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE Buyer SET BUYER_NAME= #buyer_name#, BUYER_LGU= #buyer_lgu#, BUYER_BANK= #buyer_bank#, BUYER_BANKNO= #buyer_bankno#, BUYER_BANKNAME= #buyer_bankname#, BUYER_ZIP= #buyer_zip#, BUYER_ADD1= #buyer_add1#, BUYER_ADD2= #buyer_add2#, BUYER_COMTEL= #buyer_comtel#, BUYER_FAX= #buyer_fax#, BUYER_MAIL= #buyer_mail#, BUYER_CHARGER= #buyer_charger#, BUYER_TELEXT= #buyer_telext# where BUYER_ID= #buyer_id#
